title: Jibdeen
author: Jibdeen
content: Seeing how Bitcoin is taking over some of the world investments lately ,I was wondering if some days bitcoin will eventually become the the biggest and the best investment in the world even above real estate and the key investment in the world. So what is your opinion about Bitcoin being the biggest and best investment in the world?

comments.author: Ambatman
comments.body: Is a possibility and has its potential. I believe best Investments are subjective. If we talking about increment since inception or listing then I can say it's the biggest investment or one of in recent years. Real Estate is still the Now and still in the future One of our basic needs as humans is shelter So like Real estate is essential do is Agriculture. Bitcoin helps in creating and protecting of wealth without the need of a third party.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: It depends on the point of view, there are some markets that are higher than the bitcoin market cap, a good example is the gold market and to see bitcoin higher than gold will be complex.But the profit that users can get on a bitcoin investment is higher than any other asset from my point of view.

comments.author: Natalim
comments.body: Quote from: Jibdeen on January 02, 2025, 06:10:45 PM   Seeing how Bitcoin is taking over some of the world investments lately ,I was wondering if some days bitcoin will eventually become the the biggest and the best investment in the world even above real estate and the key investment in the world. So what is your opinion about Bitcoin being the biggest and best investment in the world?Bitcoin at the moment has certainly the potentials and even one of the most influential investments so far.  So it's not really impossible to see bitcoin as the world's biggest investment in the future. However, there are also certain factors that until now become a struggle for bitcoin to reach the said phase for bitcoin. It's volatility alone is indeed a big threat for global adoption. It's regulation and legal framework is still not highly established. But if only bitcoin will continue to be seen as a digital gold because of its increasing store of value, and having financial institutions to back up bitcoin, then it won't be surprising for bitcoin to become the best world's investment in the future.

comments.author: Cityhunter34
comments.body: As far as I know, Bitcoin remains the best and biggest investment in the world. However, to truly enjoy its benefits and generate substantial profits, it's crucial to establish a reliable source of income.This steady stream of funds will allow you to cover unexpected expenses without dipping into your Bitcoin investment. Moreover, it's essential to understand that investing in Bitcoin is a long term commitment, not a get rich quick scheme.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: By comparing it with other investment properties, some people already regard it as one of the best investment assets so far, but if we are to look at market capitalisation, it's still a bit far behind, but it can get there; all that's required is more force on adoption and an increase in price, then it can obtain that biggest investment as for the best; it's already the best depending on who you ask.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Bitcoin will never lose its potential in the future of global investment. For me it’s already the best investment because it’s much easier to buy Bitcoin nowadays. Compared to real estate you can’t acquire property immediately because it’s expensive and just thinking about the process and all the necessary documents feels like a hassle. The opportunities Bitcoin offers make it a truly unique asset class. With the rising interest from institutions and mainstream adoption I can confidently say we’re headed in that direction.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: I think the whole best investment thing is kind of relative, you know? Like, investing always has some amount of risk no matter what.  Bitcoin is still pretty new thing and real estate has been around longer though and people usually think its more stableAt the end of the day, the best investment for someone comes down to their personal situation.  Theres no one size fits all answer.  For some folks Bitcoin works, and for others, something like real estate makes more sense.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Like others have said on the thread, it’s a relative subject. Some people will prefer gold or real estate to investing in bitcoin and they might just be as successful at it. Different strokes for different folks. It is my belief that Bitcoin will be the biggest investment in my portfolio, this is why I’m very confident in my hodlings despite the volatility of bitcoin.

comments.author: Judith87403
comments.created_time: January 02, 2025, 09:41:49 PMLast edit: January 02, 2025, 09:54:16 PM by Judith87403
comments.body: Quote from: Jibdeen on January 02, 2025, 06:10:45 PM   Seeing how Bitcoin is taking over some of the world investments lately ,I was wondering if some days bitcoin will eventually become the the biggest and the best investment in the world even above real estate and the key investment in the world. So what is your opinion about Bitcoin being the biggest and best investment in the world?I was actually thinking the same with Op, but one thing we should know is that nothing last forever I think we are still in the era of bitcoin, well if you ask me about bitcoin being the biggest and the best investment in the world? I must say that the question is very technical because if you look at other investment out there you will discover that, that same risk involved in bitcoin investment is also applicable in other investment. is it the price not being stable? You know this also happens in other investment out there just as it is in bitcoin investment,  so I think bitcoin is the best investment so far.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Quote from: Jibdeen on January 02, 2025, 06:10:45 PM So what is your opinion about Bitcoin being the biggest and best investment in the world?There is the possibility of it being the biggest investment, many people see it as such already and will always quickly recommend it to any body new seeking for where and what to invest in, but the another inquiry which just came to my mind now is that would bitcoin be able to stay as the biggest investment? or will it just come and go just as other things that have been regarded as the best investment did before?

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: Jibdeen on January 02, 2025, 06:10:45 PM   Seeing how Bitcoin is taking over some of the world investments lately ,I was wondering if some days bitcoin will eventually become the the biggest and the best investment in the world even above real estate and the key investment in the world. So what is your opinion about Bitcoin being the biggest and best investment in the world?Both the terms "biggest" and "best" are subjective that's we can't answer this accurately.Biggest in what? Market cap? Users? Best in what? For me, real estate is still at the top when it comes to investment. Yes, the capital that you need in real estate is quite high (unless you will invest into REITS), but the reward in the long run can be good and it can give you passive income through rental income. As for Bitcoin, it can go as high as real estate since it's appreciating in price because of the limited supply, but right now, there's no certainty on it yet. Bitcoin is still on the adoption stage so thinking like this is for me, a bit early. Can we just not think about this first, and think about the adoption rate of Bitcoin around the world?

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: For me it's already the best investment ever! Now regards popularity it's really unlikely Bitcoin is going to become the top 1 in the world, because it's just too risky and volatile for most investors. Common sense goes for safer routes, like fixed passive income methods offered by banks (even though it's unprofitable) and conservative investments like real estate, which is also a very good alternative. People aren't willing to see their assets melting 20%-50% in a matter of days in crypto market.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Of course it will, I think in the next 10-20 years Bitcoin gonna become the world biggest investment, if we talk about the market cap. Right now Bitcoin market cap is $2 Trillion, if we assume every 4 years the market cap will be doubled, it took around 16 years to make it $32 Trillion, higher than gold market cap.Bitcoin is the best investment as long as you hold the real Bitcoin in your wallet, not the ETF version or hold in CEX.

comments.author: Patrol69
comments.body: There are still many countries in the world where Bitcoin is not directly approved. Bitcoin is a digital currency and currently the amount of investment in this digital currency has increased a lot and gradually the popularity of this coin is increasing worldwide. If every country in the world approves Bitcoin then I believe Bitcoin will become the most reliable digital currency for investment. But now even if the amount of investment in this digital currency increases, the media will not take this issue very seriously because Bitcoin has not moved globally like the dollar. But I believe in future people will invest in this bitcoin with much reliability.

comments.body: That will possible to see that happen in the future especially if we are still alive when that is happen. comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: It already is the best investment, it has been the best performing asset over the last 15 years. To be the biggest investment in the world we need to see the market cap surpass Golds. It will happen but it might be in the 2030’s.Stay calm, humble & stack sats, safe in the knowledge that Bitcoin is the best investment that exists.
